description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger, following R. Mach. Yahuda. 22 to 25 lines per page. Written in medium small casual naskh using black ink. The commented text is overlined in black. Some portions of the text are crossed out (see fasc. 1, fol. 1a). Glazed European paper with watermark ("Tre lune"). Catchword on the verso of the last leaf of each quire. From fasc. 2 on, the quires are numbered using Arabic numerals (fasc. 3, 4, and 5 numbered consecutively, our copy comprising thus 3 vol.). Note on the number of quires and leaves on the first fol. of each fascicle (except fasc. 1, aceph.). From fasc. 2, fol. 225b on: date on the lower outer corner of the last leaf of each quire. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals. Inscription "NES no. 1322" on a label pasted on the inner side of the upper cover. Inscription "ELS no. 1323" on a label pasted on the fly leaf before fol. 1a of fasc. 1. Autograph (see colophons fasc. 4, fol. 133a; fasc. 5, fol. 127b). Fasc. 1: written on Friday 25 Muḥarram 1193 (colophon, fol. 454b) ; collated? in 1199 (fol. 454b). Fasc. 3: collation? notes dated 12 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1198 (fol. 10b, lower outer corner) to 15 J[umādá al-Ulá?] 1199 (fol. 100b, lower outer corner). Fasc. 4: written on Sunday 22 Jumādá al-Thānī 1199 (colophon, fol. 133a); collation? notes dated 18 J[umādá al-Ulá?] 1199 (fol. 10b, lower outer corner) to 27 J[umādá al-Thānī?] 1199 (fol. 126b, lower outer corner). Fasc. 5: written on Tuesday 29 Rajab 1199 (colophon, fol. 127b); collation? notes dated 1 Rajab 1199 (fol. 10b, lower outer corner) to 27 Rajab 1199 (fol. 118b, lower outer corner). Incipit fasc. 1: الآثار جمع اثر تقدم تعريفه وكذا الفرق بينه وبين الخبر فى اول الكتاب\\
